alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 14 at 3:21PM MST until December 15 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of two to four inches. * WHERE...Tooele and Rush Valleys, Northern Wasatch Front, Salt Lake Valley and Utah Valley. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley
